website_summaries.verdict: One of the best floating desks available for people needing extra desk space in a common room. Keeps everything out of the way and off the floor.
pros: Desk is easy to assemble and mount with the included hardware and mounting brackets
cons: Objects on the upper shelf can fall off if desk is knocked
Will require additional help to mount safely

customer_reviews.title: Great desk.
customer_reviews.text: Desk was an easy install and looks great! I love it. It saves a lot of space and yet still has enough room to get things done. Only bad thing is, once its hanging up, it's hard to get the cables to come in and out of the small space in the back of the desk meant to hide everything. So if you add things to it afterwards it's a pain to get the new cords inside.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Simao

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this desk, fit perfectly for the design i was going for. quality seems very sturdy and seems like it will last although the finish seems a bit delicate- sort of like ikea finishes. Also, just to note you have to be able to hit THREE studs in the wall to hang this, that seems to be something that should be brought to light. I am very happy with my purchase and recommend this piece, its different than anything I've really seen before and is functional for sure. I assembled and mounted this alone- however I think mounting for a female alone might be difficult since it was a bit heavy. Just saying.
customer_reviews.author: NYCLerka

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble. Very sturdy. Looks great.
customer_reviews.text: This floating desk is a great addition to any small space. The desk has an elegant yet minimalist look that combines practicality with esthetics. The simplicity of it's design offers a range of uses without overdoing it, the result being an incredibly sturdy work platform that is easy to organize while remaining pleasing to the eye. Acceptable in a wide range of environments from the kids room to the most formal office setting, this bold piece of modernistic wizardry will draw compliments from even the most conservative of furniture afficionados. The assembly process was also very easy.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice and was Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Exceptional use of space and couldn't be happier with it. Spend time sorting and matching up parts with pictures and take your time. It will go together easily with patience and has proven to be a GREAT buy. I went the extra step to ensure it would not weaken over time, so I used Gorilla Wood Glue as I assembled it and when dry, rock solid! I would recommend this as a solid buy and my son absolutely loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Aboatguy

customer_reviews.title: Love it love it love this!!
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what to say about this floating computer desk...except that I love it!! It's very very well made and it arrived with no flaws whatsoever and exactly what I hoped it would be. My husband put it together yesterday in about an hours time. We made sure that we found the "studs 16" on center" on the wall, this is so important to do. If you would just use the regular drywall anchors, trust me you would soon be in trouble! I am so thrilled that I found this and was equally happy to say goodbye to my older computer desk that took up too much space!
customer_reviews.author: Ellie V218

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with scratches
customer_reviews.text: Nothing to like yet as I did not continue unpacking past the first piece, which was scratched on both surfaces. I took a day off to put it together with/for my lil kindergartener. Do you know what happens when a 5 year old is looking forward to something and right in front of him I have to repack it after hyping it up the day before? He's confused and thinks he's getting punished... cue the hour-long tantrum. Ive made note on the return/replacement page and already downloaded the RMA, but it sucks having to wait for another 10 days, while I (a disabled person) have to lug this thing to a nearby UPS.
customer_reviews.author: GMV

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this desk. It was easy to assemble and mount - the directions recommend two people but I did it alone with no problem. It would be nice if it came with a pull-out keyboard tray, but it's fine without one. It is spacious enough to accommodate my keyboard and any notebooks or texts I am using while still being more compact than other desks I've owned. I would definitely recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: I love it, but not the greatest quality.
customer_reviews.text: I was excited about this desk. It does look amazing once its finished, but it did get ruined while making it. The instructions are very poorly made. Also the slightest bump makes huge imprints on the desk. So if you want something to last long (which I assume you do since its getting mounted on your wall) then be very careful at all times with this desk. Even the ends already have marks from the computer chair rotating into it. Overall I love the style and works great for a 27" touchscreen computer. I absolutely love the hidden part of the desk to hold cords. I do recommend , but I also recommend to be careful around it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durable, affordable, and we love it!
customer_reviews.text: This desk was easy to assemble and mount onto the wall. It is very sturdy and appears to be pretty durable. My son likes it best because it has no legs on the floor to get in the way of his rolling chair. He uses the top shelf to display his trophies and a couple photo frames. The six small cubby spaces fit little desk supplies, and the desktop is plenty large enough for his laptop, organizer, textbook, whatever needs to be visible, all at once. I would definitely recommend it for a room where space is limited or where you desire a more modern or masculine desk.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Lindberg

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Desk
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed with the quality, design, and how quick it was to put this desk together and mounting process. The contents of the package are packed very well. I actually witnessed UPS drop off the package and I though the poor landing the driver accomplished bad as it landed on one corner to harshly, but since everything was packaged nicely the corner items remain unaffected by the postal drivers mishandling. This was a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: xiomary

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Happy with this desk.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, easy to assemble, with good instructions. Very easy to hide cables and a place to mount an LED light. It took me about an hour to assemble the unit. About another 30 min spent measuring/marking and drilling wall for mounting the bracket. Best to assemble it in an area where you have some room. My only complaint is with the hex bit that came with the unit. It was so cheap that it stripped. I was very careful, I installed 2 units and had the same problem on both. My recommendation would be to use your own tools.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Marino

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and sleek!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful item! Fits perfectly in the corner, saves a ton of space and the design is pretty. My studs were spaced further apart than the instructions allowed so I was only able to use two instead of the recommended 3 but it worked perfectly fine. The desk feels completely secure with my laptop and some other desk items. Sometimes I even forget that it's mounted on the wall instead of a traditional desk and lean on it a little and it never budges. Also, I'm not very experienced with anything more than hanging a framed print and this went off without a hitch. I did order a stud finder to be sure that I was securing it properly.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Miissing Parts take 2 weeks to ship.
customer_reviews.text: Package was missing the wall mount bracket in the box. It is going to take TWO WEEKS for them to ship me the bracket!! I should of just returned it on their dime and ordered another one. I would of gotten it faster. Other than that.. the floating desk is pretty sturdy for particle board and laminate. I am sure it will be great once it is mounted on the wall.. in two or so weeks from this post.. The instructions were straight forward and it was easy to put together overall.
customer_reviews.author: Delaney Interactive

customer_reviews.title: ... be replaced just email the manufacture and they have great customer service
customer_reviews.text: if you keep heavy items on the top shelf it'll bend downward but if any parts need to be replaced just email the manufacture and they have great customer service. tell them what you need and it'll be sent to you. great desk for saving space. I'd buy it again. side note this desk only fits a computer and keyboard, really hard to get a text book from class and put it on the desk space along with writing some notes and looking things up online (not enough space for note taking, book and keyboard) so i mainly just use this for surfing the web.
customer_reviews.author: Christian A.

customer_reviews.title: Great looking space saving desk!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this desk when remodeling my 16 year old sons room. His room is a little on the smaller side so we needed to find some space saving options. This floating desk was a great solution and very simple to install. The desk top is plenty big for his large laptop and text books. I really like the compartment below the desk that can hold a power strip or the like and keeps all the wires out of sight. I also like the fact that you can set it at what ever height is best for you and what ever chair you decide to use. We could not be happier with our purchase!
customer_reviews.author: CASEY and MIKE PONCE

customer_reviews.title: Delivered broken.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in December of 2019 while it was on sale and stored it under my bed until I got my son's rooms finished. Finally opened it today and five of the major pieces are broken. Absolute garbage. I'm outside of the return window for the item so my only hope is that PREPAC sends me the correct pieces unbroken. I do not recommend this product, spend your money on something higher quality, because $150 for this isn't worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent desk! Set aside about an hour and a 1/2 when setting this up. I found the directions ok and not to hard to follow. I have had this up for just over a year and it has held up almost perfectly to a 16/30 year old girl. Actually just got done remounting it into my 14 yo sons room. Will see how the next year goes... But most definitely worth the money and time of setup! I would recommend this desk to anyone it is very versatile and well built.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Perfect. Needed something small and out of the way
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. Needed something small and out of the way. This seem sturdy and beautiful. Perfect for my son's work station.
customer_reviews.author: Sammy

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: These desks are great! Can be assembled in under two hours and look great once mounted. I highly recommend purchasing a pack of Toggler self drilling drywall screws as well, I managed to break one of the included screws in half while screwing the screw into the stud. If I didn't have the toggler screws I would've been in trouble. I have two if these desks side by side in my gaming room and they look great!
customer_reviews.author: My Living Legacy

customer_reviews.title: Made in Canada
customer_reviews.text: My semi-handy wife assembled and hung this all herself. Well made in Canada and have the floating nightstand/headboard from Prepac also. Perfect for a small room or any area you don't want something sitting on the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Outback Jack

customer_reviews.title: Modern space saver! Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: Saves a lot of legroom with a modern look and very sturdy construction. Also holds an APC battery backup hidden inside the hollow back space! Very few wires exposed!
customer_reviews.author: J. Kriezel

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for the price
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son and he loves it. Took about 3 hours to build and put up, very clear instructions. Needs two people to put up on the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's a cool desk. Like most
customer_reviews.text: It's a cool desk. Like most, it is made of particle board which is covered by plastic like covering. One of my shelves came damaged on a corner. The desk is beautiful, however, and for the price who can't give it 5 stars. It was easy to put together, but it would probably be an arduous task for a novice. I love my desk, but I wouldn't buy another. When I really love something, I always want 2.
customer_reviews.author: ArchAngel7

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Purchase! Great deal.
customer_reviews.text: This desk was amazing! I was a little skeptical at first but I read all the reviews and it changed my mind. It wasn't that that hard to assemble but I wouldn't recommend you buy it without a having stud finder and finding the beam in your walls where you are going to put the desk. I got lucky that the wall I put the desk on had two beams in the perfect spot for it. If not the desk will not hold on the wall and fall. The desk is a great space saver and looks elegant and lovely. I'm very happy with this purchase and I'm in love with my new desk.
customer_reviews.author: Maria C. Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: It was pretty easy to assemble. Great quality. It even comes with a small marker to fix any scratches! It's very nice on the wall and fits a rolling stool under comfortably. I'm glad we went with something a little different, really pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Kate W.

customer_reviews.title: kid loves it
customer_reviews.text: this became the "gaming desk". fits a 28'' tv/monitor perfectly. mounted playstation and of the game below. nice wire hiding shelf. overall a good product.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: It is very sturdy. However
customer_reviews.text: It was hard to put together. It is very sturdy. However, it doesn't have much space on it. The side compartments don't hold much of anything except decorative things, or pens. On the actual of the desk I can hold my laptop, a notebook, a cup of tea, and a textbook, but it gets extremely cramped. I guess I was just expecting more space. But the desk is beautiful, and it does store my knick knacks.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy wall desk for a mini work station
customer_reviews.text: I used mine as a keyboard workstation at standing height (34”) since my keyboard is already at my sitting height (26”). When I’m sitting down it actually puts my laptop at the perfect viewing height. Assembly and installation was so easy. You’ll definitely need two people to put it on the wall though, but it literally took less than a minute to place the desk on the wall bracket.
customer_reviews.author: riMix

customer_reviews.title: Great Space Saver for Small Rooms
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! My son loves it. Saves a ton of space, was not difficult to put together. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Leyanna Torres

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: This floating desk was perfect for what I needed. Our bedroom is a bit small so having this piece being less intrusive as far as sq. footage was exactly what I was looking for. It was easy to assemble and it's sturdy on the wall. I used it as a vanity for my fiancé, I installed a mirror and some lights which fit nicely and added a few shelves off the sides for more storage... She absolutely loves it!!!
customer_reviews.author: MKM

customer_reviews.title: ABSOLUTELY LOVE THIS!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my computer room which is very small to save on space. I absolutely love it!!! It did its job by saving space and as an added bonus it makes my room look very classy. My husband says it was no problem putting on the wall as long as you hang it where the wall studs are to give it that extra sturdiness. The shelves are an added bonus to put pictures or candles to dress up the room if you choose. I will definitely recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: jamila jackson

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the price - looks good and is functional
customer_reviews.text: We really like this product. For the most part, it is very sturdy and it looks great. Only negative is that the top shelf has a dent in it, but not bad enough to detract from the functionality or looks. It save a ton of floor space, which is needed in the spare bedroom where we installed it.
customer_reviews.author: PC Goddess

customer_reviews.title: Loooooove my new baby
customer_reviews.text: Let me tell you... It's not the easiest thing to out together but boy is it worth it!!!! I'm seriously obsessed. I bought it to use as a vanity and it's so perfect!!!!!!! I bought a mirror, track type lights and so small bins all from Amazon and it came together like a dream... I have tons and tons of make up and hair stuff and although it t doesn't hold everything it holds way more than I need on a daily basis! Great buy!!!!
customer_reviews.author: krysta

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with the overall experience--However
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the overall experience--However, there was one side with many scuffed marks--and low and behold, that side with the scuffed marks is the side that we see right away (the other--good one--side is against the wall)....my luck. I think they need to pack them better so that it handles the transportation/handling better. Other than that--nice sturdy space saving desk.
customer_reviews.author: OERA1

customer_reviews.title: Arrived SCUFFED EVERYWHERE
customer_reviews.text: The desk came scuffed up everywhere on the front desk part and all the rest of the parts. The drill holes were carelessly drilled and look a mess... it looks like I bought the thing USED... not happy what so ever
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra

customer_reviews.title: I love the shelves all around it
customer_reviews.text: This took about 4 hours to put together and hang up. It is a true black color. I love the shelves all around it! it's been holding up great for 2 months so far. Make sure to measure where you want it multiple times, so you get it right. I thought it was nice they include a marker for any blemishes.
customer_reviews.author: BowserJagerTop Contributor: Amiibo

customer_reviews.title: Great desk!
customer_reviews.text: Our apartment has floor heaters on most the walls which makes furniture a pain. Bought this for my husband and we love it. Only wish the bottom could fold up when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Had mine for 5 months now and still absolutely love it. Saves tons of space
customer_reviews.text: Had mine for 5 months now and still absolutely love it. Saves tons of space , goes perfectly for my room and a perfect place to do my school work. The wood seems very nice and sturdy . Installing it on the wall was a little difficult but definitely do-able . Still love this desk sooo much and do not regret my purchase what's so ever. Very convenient and I'm very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Wally

customer_reviews.title: Tricky to build, easy to like
customer_reviews.text: I like it, but for I found the instructions a bit of a challenge. The parts themselves aren't labeled, and EVERYTHING has holes in it so it's hard to make sure you've got the right one just by looking at the drawings. I managed to get two parts on backwards, in fact, but didn't notice until after I had it on the wall. Not high on my priority list to fix yet. Sturdy construction, however.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Gatliff

customer_reviews.title: If you have a cordless drill and a screwdriver there’s no reason not to have this awesome desk hanging on your wall in 30 minuets
customer_reviews.text: I was a little apprehensive about buying desk because of some of the other reviews, saying how difficult instructions we’re to understand and how long it took. If you have a cordless drill and a screwdriver there’s no reason not to have this awesome desk hanging on your wall in 30 minuets, instructions vary easy to fallow, looks great and really sturdy. My son loves it in his room doesn’t take up much space, I recommend this for anyone looking for a nice desk for small space.
customer_reviews.author: Israel Molina

customer_reviews.title: So much better than a standing desk!
customer_reviews.text: So easy to put together and hang! Seriously, no stupid fumbling or trying to figure out what the directions mean. It's just simple, and really really sturdy! Can't wait to probably buy another one as we expand our home furnishings. Only teensy issue would be that I personally would recommend mounting it higher than advised in the instructions so your chair can fit underneath when pushed in.
customer_reviews.author: Micheal Dowdal

customer_reviews.title: Great desk!
customer_reviews.text: It takes longer than an hour to put together, especially if you are doing it alone. But it went together well following the instructions. Its very nice for the price.
customer_reviews.author: edna wade

customer_reviews.title: Great Desk, Unique
customer_reviews.text: Have 2 of these for my kids, plan to get one. Very sturdy and nice looking (not cheap or cheap looking).
customer_reviews.author: Hobbs1791

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality, Easy to Assemble, Cheap, Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful black floating desk from Prepac Manufacturing. It is built really well, you can tell that they spent time designing this to fit perfectly on the well! Really easy to assemble and great on your wallet! I use this in my office and have a 5K iMac sitting in the middle and it fits perfect! Easily holds the weight of my iMac.
customer_reviews.author: MrGeek

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: Was more difficult to assemble than once thought, but it worked out and I'm still using it...Cannot scoot in completely under the desk due to support underneath. That is my only disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Other sell for 300.00 plus you know the airline catalogs (no names)
customer_reviews.text: The best desk for a private area of your own. It requires allot of assembly if your not a do it your self Guy or gal forget. You will have to hire a Handyman cause its a real hard job. Also when you hang it be sure not to follow exact levels from floor to ceiling cause your plug may get covered up as mine did cause the Handyman did as instructed in directions. all walls are different. But great Desk . I got free shipping when I joined Prime it paid for it self and i now have better shipping deals and free access to movies and more!
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence Colins

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together, and just the right size.
customer_reviews.text: This Is just what I was looking for. Doesn’t take up very much room and everything fits on top of it. I’m thoroughly satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: kokoagunz

customer_reviews.title: Missing screws
customer_reviews.text: It was missing screws. Kinda hard to put together with missing screws
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: The best for the cash and space!
customer_reviews.text: Great table, great price, easy setup, extra parts, 1 downside, the screws that it comes with for the wall should have anchors for the wall, they seem strong enough, but I play it safe than sorry. Detail is very nice, overall a great table
customer_reviews.author: NYCaNdYmAn

customer_reviews.title: Overall pleased
customer_reviews.text: This desk is super cute. I am overall pleased with it. My only issue with it was that the edge was sharp and my husband had to file it down a bit so it didn't cut into my arm while holding the mouse or typing on the keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa T

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: This desk is awesome! It looks great against my blue wall, and it is very well made. I have absolutely no complaints. I don't remember how I adhered it to the wall, but man, that thing is really up there. I also love not hitting my legs under the desk because there isn't any desk legs confining mine. Wonderful product
customer_reviews.author: Kimberely

customer_reviews.title: Great floating desk
customer_reviews.text: Great floating desk. Was not sure what to expect when I bought it. It is very sturdy and was not too difficult to build. Do need to have two people to hang on wall! I have gotten quite a few compliments on this desk,
customer_reviews.author: hbaum

customer_reviews.title: I have never enjoyed putting something together as much as this floating desk
customer_reviews.text: Of all the put together furniture, I have never enjoyed putting something together as much as this floating desk, it was easy, and it was easy even putting it on the rails after I installed them. It freed up a ton of space, it looks beautiful, I am in very high spirits after installing this desk. I highly recommend this desk, the best in the West,
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: love love the desk
customer_reviews.text: love love the desk, its made really heavy and sturdy. none of the pieces were labeled with a Letter Sticker to identify which piece goes where. once you get that figured out it went together smoothly. you have to make sure you leave space on both sides of the mounting bracket to ensure the desk surrounds the wall mount. overall, awesome product and i love how modern it is
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Commerford

customer_reviews.title: love this desk
customer_reviews.text: Not to hard to put together. My husband and I did it in less then a hour. I love love love this desk!! only thing is now I have to figure out where to put my printer. Think a file cabinet next to my desk and put the printer on top should work. If they had a bigger desk to buy I would have, but sooo glad I got this it makes me happy every time I see it and everyone else loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Shopping addiction

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded Expectations
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the look and quality of this desk for the price. Nice finish that does not scratch easily - although a touch-up marker was provided! Easy to put together and hang with 2 people. No problems with parts or assembly. Arrived on time. Perfect for our kitchen area - we now have a place for the computer that doesn't take up a lot of space. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: rebs

customer_reviews.title: Don't get me wrong I do like the desk
customer_reviews.text: The cable management compartment is impossible to access once the desk is mounted to the wall. Had to cut out a channel in the front piece under the desk top to be able to utilize a slide out keyboard tray. Don't get me wrong I do like the desk, but before I even got it I built a better design from just looking at the picture. This does have a much better mounting capability compared to the one I made myself.
customer_reviews.author: EmpressNovaDyne

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for tight, complex spaces.
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, narrow profile, and great for our small space. We had no need for the two lower shelves on the left and right side so we just left those off, and now we can fit folders and binders there.
customer_reviews.author: Mrsbohannon

customer_reviews.title: but looks amazing and works well
customer_reviews.text: now it is installed would have prefered a tray for keyboard, i anticipated more destop space, but looks amazing and works well. ( would not suggest to people with tower computers, or gaming computers, as there is nowhere to put the computer tower though i simply mounted mine on the wall to display the internals, this may not be for everyone)
customer_reviews.author: tyler l

customer_reviews.title: Space saver!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my son’s small bedroom! My 8 year old has the smallest bedroom in our house, so when he asked me for a desk I was concerned that it would take up the entire room! This floating desk is the perfect solution and it looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: My son is very happy with this desk.
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy! One small nick in a panel. Looks great! Will order again for my office.
customer_reviews.author: Rae

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: This ended up going in the family room providing the perfect amount of space for a 27 inch imac. Keep in mind when mounting it to go a few inches over instruction recomendation. It saves a little space and really adds some modern appeal to an otherwise boring room. Setup was easy. I expected the boards to be labeled but they were not. This was not an issue just read carefully and you will do fine.
customer_reviews.author: EastWest

customer_reviews.title: A desk to impress
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for it looks very nice on my wall. For what it cost it's really not bad Plenty of space for extra things If you need a desk but don't have the space for the standard you won't be disappointed with this item
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Williams

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this desk! I recently renovated my living room. I was looking for a desk that wouldn't take up a lot of space. This is perfect! It is a wall mount desk so I was able to tuck it in the corner of the room and definitely didn't "overtake" the space. It is stylish and looks great with my decor. It gives me a place to browse the internet and I can still be with my family and watch tv. If your looking for a great looking, space saving desk, this is it!
customer_reviews.author: Kimmy

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I have a small office desk and this fits just perfect in there. Very easy to install and is nice and sturdy I am very pleased with this product. Not to mention shipping was fast! The color black is an actual real pitch black! THIS IS A MUST HAVE! It also hangs lovely and its sturdy enough that i know it can't fall down!!!
customer_reviews.author: sue

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Efficient
customer_reviews.text: I just finished assembling and hanging two units for the start of a new school year. The assembly was easy and mounting it to the wall was straightforward. When the process was complete and I finished wiping them down and cleaning up the construction debris, they look wonderful. They are also a very efficient use of space. Even though my children won't be happy with all the homework they have to do, I'm hoping they are happy with their new workspaces. One suggestion for improvement, might be the addition of a LED light strip above the main working area.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and strong
customer_reviews.text: Amazingly built. Can hold a lot! Hasn't failed us yet. Would be nice if it had a shelf to hold the printer but not bad. Doesn't really save a lot of space though.
customer_reviews.author: Mrsmj182

customer_reviews.title: Great desk, space saver
customer_reviews.text: Great desk, space saver. Easy set up. It took my 11 year old son and I an hour to put together. My son loves it. Durable. We’ve had it for almost a year now.
customer_reviews.author: Klein

customer_reviews.title: Perfect in every way.
customer_reviews.text: This was the most stress free, put it together yourself, product I have ever bought. All the holes for the screws, cam locks, etc fit perfectly and lined up. I am also incredibly impressed with the quality of the product itself. If you have "put it together" rage like I have when I get something cheap from China, this is the complete opposite. I dare say I enjoyed putting it together.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Really happy with this desk
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with this desk. Just what i needed for my my basement mancave. My new 27inch iMac fits perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Quality Desk
customer_reviews.text: Great floating desk! Was able to put it together and mount it by myself in a little over an hour.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Riddle

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this after searching high and low for a small desk for our guest bedroom. Very happy with the purchase. After unpacking all the pieces, the assembly required looked to be more than I bargained for, but we followed the directions and in just over an hour, it was installed. Definitely need two people though. It looks great and is very sturdy. Now I'm hoping to find a similar piece to replace the free standing table in my laundry room from this manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Luvonlineshopping

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy construction, good finish and excellent packaging
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy construction, good finish and excellent packaging. Wifey poo suggested this for each of our boys' bedrooms... they like it, there's some great little additions to it like power cord cutouts and runs and the whole thing was assembled and mounted in under an hour. Very happy with the purchase and a great price as well. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Don Almer

customer_reviews.title: Great, functional desk
customer_reviews.text: This desk went in my 13-year old son's room. Instructions were clear and all materials were included and well packaged. Assembly was very straightforward. There were both written and video resources which made things even more clear and easy-to-follow. The paper instructions came with the desk, videos were available via YouTube. Construction detail was very good: holes were where they were supposed to be, pieces fit together properly, there was definitely quality in the manufacturing and construction. To me, these things are critical when you have to assemble anything yourself. My only minor gripe is that the finish was somewhat fragile and subject to minor damage during assembly...not a big deal. It's a great desk at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: CommonSense

customer_reviews.title: Easy Installation, Exactly as Described, But Missing a Couple Small Parts
customer_reviews.text: The desk is exactly as described. It took me a little over an hour to assemble and mount without any help, and there were detailed and accurate instructions. Unfortunately there weren't enough screw cover caps provided. I needed 12, as specified in the instructions, but only 9 were included. I would definitely give this 5 stars if that detail hadn't been overlooked.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great space saver
customer_reviews.text: My son is in College and this works great for his small bedroom. I was worried about the weight of the item. The way that it hangs on the wall I have had no problems with stability. Great space saver for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Suzette B.

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: Haven't seen anything else like this. The assembly isn't easy at all (~2 hours) but it works well and looks good. The shelves do not stay in place very well, but the surface is the perfect depth. Best of all.... It has a storage area for cords under it. That storage keeps you from seeing all the cords hanging down.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Mockerman

customer_reviews.title: Great for those with limited space.
customer_reviews.text: We have had more compliments on this piece of furniture in our home more than anything else. The ability to have a desk but not take up floor space is wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: User of Products

customer_reviews.title: Extremely happy with it
customer_reviews.text: I installed it in my fast food restaurant so that we can keep the floor area clear and clean. Extremely happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: 5AB

customer_reviews.title: Still its not a bad product just had more issues putting this one together
customer_reviews.text: Lots of little pieces to put together and since the pieces were facing the other way didn't see that it was damaged during shipping until i had put the last piece on . was to frustrated by that point to even call manufacture since I had to on another product I got from them from another site. Still its not a bad product just had more issues putting this one together.
customer_reviews.author: N.E.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT wall desk we had put in for my son's ...
customer_reviews.text: GREAT wall desk we had put in for my son's room. We got new furniture (larger bed) and didn't want to crowd the room. It is a great space saver and does the job! Material is sturdy and looks very nice.
customer_reviews.author: JaNeen Howard

customer_reviews.title: I can't explain how awesome these things are for my house
customer_reviews.text: I can't explain how awesome these things are for my house. I don't have a small home but not having a traditional desk makes this product worth every penny. Great design with multiple shelves after three months, very sturdy. I would pay for a mahogany version of this.
customer_reviews.author: David C. Romero

customer_reviews.title: Easy to build, strong, and great looking.
customer_reviews.text: This desk was a super addition to my daughters room. It was easy to assemble and feels solid hanging on the wall. Plus it looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well engineered and easy to assemble.......
customer_reviews.text: This is a well engineered desk the hanging system makes it easy to hang. The directions are easy to follow and relatively well translated for being a Chinese product. It is all particle board construction but everything is precision cut and drilled. If you want a wall mounted desk I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic;
customer_reviews.text: this desk is wonderful, i love that it hangs from the wall. it is really heavy though, 100 pounds, but i think it's perfect. does require two people to hang it, i put it together myself though quite simply. it's very sturdy, worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: koryssa

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy. I love that it can be used as ...
customer_reviews.text: My 10 yr old LOVES this desk. Very sturdy. I love that it can be used as a vanity if she wants when she get older! Love the sleekness of it as well. Arrived in perfect condition. Would recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Julie G.      Essex CT

customer_reviews.title: Hubby installed it within an hour and he loves it ...
customer_reviews.text: Hubby installed it within an hour and he loves it!! I also appreciate the small amount of space it takes up.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Shelton

customer_reviews.title: it looks glorious..
customer_reviews.text: let me Start off by saying make sure you have all the tools before starting. Also be gentle when you pound in the black plastic bits in.I got my 27in imac on it now and it looks glorious.
customer_reviews.author: joseph

customer_reviews.title: Good Little Desk
customer_reviews.text: Not to bad, I bought one for my son and it worked out really well for his small room. The only issue that I had was the mounting instructions were a little short or high. I can't remember. Other than that I bought another one for my daughter. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas C. Houghton

customer_reviews.title: Straight forward instructions
customer_reviews.text: Had a great experience building and installing this desk. All measurements are spot on. Comes with tools necessary but will need your own for easier install. I did add a couple wall anchors for straight. My kids love it
customer_reviews.author: Denise G

customer_reviews.title: Aesthetically pleasing
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly for the space for which it was intended. Fits my monitor and keyboard without any worries about space. Seems sturdy. I feel like this was a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: shopgurl

customer_reviews.title: space saver desk
customer_reviews.text: I bought this desk as a christmas present for my teenage daughter and she loves it. It was easy to put together and simple to hang on the wall. It is great for cramped areas to save space
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Get help if you are not use to furniture assembly.
customer_reviews.text: I like it, just wish it came in different widths.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very happy with
customer_reviews.text: Saves space! Few little scratches were on it but barely see, very happy with it
customer_reviews.author: stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, great price.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Assembly wasn't nothing, but wasn't bad. Purchased for a child's room and everyone thinks it's great. They love having a "real desk" to do homework vs. kitchen table.
customer_reviews.author: KC Jones

customer_reviews.title: Love this desk
customer_reviews.text: The only reason it didn't get 5 stars are: 1. Minor dings from shipping. 2. The wood screws it comes with are stupid. This desk is easy to assemble and hang, but don't use the wood screws they came with. Get Phillips woodscrews- the ones this comes with have allen wrench tops and they are almost impossible to manually screw into the studs, even with the holes drilled into them. This caused me much swearing. 3. Computer cords will be visible. I'm doing what I can to mask it. Other than that, love it. The main problem was being forced to use an allen wrench for the studs because my drill set doesn't have an allen wrench/socket bit.
customer_reviews.author: ChlorineQueen

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, great size for my laptop when I need ...
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, great size for my laptop when I need to use it in the bedroom. Looks and works great! Was able to set it up in about 45 minutes while watching TV.
customer_reviews.author: Dominic

customer_reviews.title: all pieces where included and in great shape. Assembly instructions were clear and easy to ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my daughter's room. The desk was well packaged, all pieces where included and in great shape. Assembly instructions were clear and easy to follow. Product seems very sturdy and looks great ... especially for the price. Great space savings design.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves it! Saves space in his small bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: JZ

customer_reviews.title: Just the right size
customer_reviews.text: Saves so much room compared to conventional desks and great price
customer_reviews.author: Neil

product_meta.title: Prepac Wall Mounted Floating Desk with Storage in Black
product_meta.description: Color:BlackOptimize your space with Prepac innovative and stylish wall mounted desk. perfectly suited for any home office, den, living room, kitchen or entryway. The stable work surface is perfect for your computer or simply as a place to get your work done. the side compartments and top shelf provide functional storage and visual appeal. Installation is a breeze with Prepac innovative metal hanging Rail system. Proudly manufactured in North America using CARB-compliant, laminated composite wood. ships ready to assemble, includes an instruction booklet for easy assembly and has a 5-year manufacturer's limited warranty.
feature_bullets: Mount at any Height with Prepac metal hanging rail system
Cable and wire management features keep your desk organized
Side compartments with two removable shelves each are ideal for speakers, electronic devices, books, photographs and other personal items
Store books, photographs and other items on the Top shelf

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars1,838 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
